prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with green scales and sharp red claws.
I want a bipedal Pokemon that has a rugged appearance and stands proudly in the forest.
Generate a fierce-looking Pokemon with a mix of earthy and vibrant colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both strength and agility, perfect for mountainous terrains.
Imagine a rugged dragon-type that thrives in caves and uses its claws to battle.
Design a Pokemon that showcases an impressive balance of green and gray colors.
Show me a unique Pokemon that has distinctive features like sharp teeth and a sturdy build.
